name: Ulnorya
description: The Ulnorya is a large aberration known for its ability to become invisible and its significant piercing and poison damage, featuring a formidable Bite and multiple tentacle attacks.
memorable: Its ability to replicate itself into two identical copies complicates combat strategies for opponents, providing a unique tactical threat.
goals: To ambush unsuspecting opponents and survive combat encounters through deception and resilience.
relations: An aberrant creature that could possibly be encountered alongside other malevolent beings of the same origin.
environment: Typically found in dark, secluded areas where it can ambush its prey.
strengths: Immunity to poison effects and resistance to bludgeoning damage makes it durable in encounters.
weaknesses: While it has resistances, it is still susceptible to other forms of damage.
attacks: Can make four attacks in a round, utilizing its Bite, Claw, and Tentacle for significant damage including the threat of paralysis.
most_powerful_ability: The Replicate ability allows it to create two identical copies, making it a formidable and confusing opponent in battle.
senses: Possesses passive Perception of 16, enabling it to sense threats effectively.
skills: Excels in Stealth (+10) and Acrobatics (+7), enhancing its ability to hide and move undetected.
additional_information: Immutable Form ensures it cannot be transformed by spells or effects.
Photoadaptive Hide grants it invisibility if it remains still.
Multiattack allows it to execute multiple types of physical attacks in a single turn.
Replicates into two identical forms for tactical advantage.
Can recombine if the two copies come within close proximity.
test_queries: large ambush creature with cloning ability
stealthy monster that can split into copies
poisonous creature that attacks with tentacles
invisible aberration known for melee attacks
deceptive monster with powerful bite and claws
